Our AI Analysis Methodology

Our AI processes thousands of Amazon customer reviews using advanced natural language processing (NLP). We extract sentiment on key attributes like efficacy, texture, absorption, value, and long-term results. Products are scored based on verified purchase reviews, weighted by recency and reviewer credibility. Only products with 1,500+ reviews qualify for top spots.
